text: Bohdan Kushnirenko (; born 2 November 1995) is a professional Ukrainian football defender who plays for MFC Mykolaiv. ==Career== Kushnirenko is a product of the different Kyivan School Systems. He spent career in the different Ukrainian Premier League Reserves teams, but in March 2016 he signed contract with the Ukrainian First League team FC Poltava. == References == ==External links== *Statistics at FFU website (Ukr) * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Kyiv Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Poltava players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players
title: Bohdan Kushnirenko
